name: 索娜什·辛哈  Sonakshi Sinha
intro: She is the daughter of legendary Indian actor Shatrughan Sinha and Poonam Sinha and sister to Luv Sinha and Kussh Sinha. She started her career as a model and walked the ramp in the Lakme Fashion week in 2008. She got her break in movies after being signed up by Salman Khan for his thriller Dabangg Born:June 2, 1987 in Bombay, Maharashtra, India
